
1a1(mdo 'grel): 'bum gyi TI ka slob dpon daMSh+Ta se nas mdzad pa'i dum bu dang po bzhugs so/ /
1b1(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa rgya cher 'grel pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
1b2(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /shes rab bdag nyid pha rol phyin pa'i gtso/ /rgyal ba'i yum la gus par phyag 'tshal nas/ /bla ma'i
1b3(mdo 'grel): lung gis bdag la phan pa'i phyir/ /'di yi gzhung 'grel gnod 'joms bya bar 'dod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
1b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs srung bar gtogs pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' 
2a1(mdo 'grel): phyag na rdo rje la/ 'phags pa byams pas 'khor gyi nang du dris pa dang/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes
2a2(mdo 'grel): bya bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa 'di bdag gis thos par khas 'ches so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
2a3(mdo 'grel): bshad do/ /zhes ci'i phyir ma brjod ce na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ni/ phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid kyi spyod yul du
2a4(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i 'dul ba'i rigs dang/
2b1(mdo 'grel): bsam pa dang spyod pa dang mos pa dang/ dbang po tha dad pa rnams la/ skad cig gcig la yang mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/
2b2(mdo 'grel): bdag med pa dang/ mi skye ba dang/ mi 'gag pa dang/ gzod ma nas zhi ba dang/ rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs par dbye ba dang/
2b3(mdo 'grel): phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs par dbye ba dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
2b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po la sogs par dbye ba dang/ stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
2b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pa dbye ba rnams skad sna tshogs dang/ sgo sna tshogs dang/ sgra sna tshogs dang/ cho 'phrul
3a1(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs dang/ 'jug pa sna tshogs dang/ 'bras bu thob pa sna tshogs kyis skad cig de nyid la bshad pa'i ye shes gcig gis
3a2(mdo 'grel): ston te/ de snyed cig car phyag na rdo rje'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad bshad do zhes ma brjod kyi/ bdag gi spyod
3a3(mdo 'grel): yul du ci tsam gyur pa nyi tshe bstan pa'i phyir/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya bar bstan to/ /de ltar cis mngon zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
3a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i mdo las/ zhi ba'i blo gros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa grangs med pa dag na/ sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can
3a5(mdo 'grel): ji snyed yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi /sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros
3b1(mdo 'grel): gal te sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu'i shes rab dang/ ye shes lta bu dang ldan
3b2(mdo 'grel): par yang gyur la/ shA ri'i bu lta bu'i sems can de dag thams cad shes rab dang/ ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang/ ye shes de sems can gcig la yod par gyur te/ rnam grangs 'dis/ sems
3b3(mdo 'grel): can thams cad shes rab dang/ ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can de dag thams cad kyis/ bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par/ the tshom dri ba bsam shing gzhal
3b4(mdo 'grel): te/ yongs su btsal la/ sems can gcig gi the tshom dri ba gang yin pa de/ gnyis pa ma yin pa'i rnam grangs 'dis/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad kyi the tshom dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
3b5(mdo 'grel): gnad du dong nas/ se gol gtogs pa srid la/ the tshom dri ba de dag gsol kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sems gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pas/ de dag gi the tshom thams cad gzung nas/ gsung gcig
3b6(mdo 'grel): brjod pas the tshom thams cad gcod de/ de dag thams cad kyang rang gi the tshom bsal bar shes shing/ zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pas/ thams cad kyang sems rangs par gyur to zhes bya ba la
4a1(mdo 'grel): sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu ste/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas/ 'dul ba rnams la bstan pa'i rim pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos sdud pa rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
4a2(mdo 'grel): kyis 'di skad bshad do zhes ma brjod par/ bdag gi spyod yul du ji tsam gyur pa dang/ ci thos pa nyi tshe bstan pa'i phyir/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni/ dus gang yang rung ba
4a3(mdo 'grel): gcig gcig na zhes bya ba'i don to/ /ci'i phyir dus nges par ma mdzad ce na/ dus nges pa bstan pa ched mi che ba'i phyir ro/ /rnam pa gcig tu na/ rtsod pa med par bya ba'i phyir yang/ dus nges pa ma bstan te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gsheD
4a4(mdo 'grel): pa ni skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid kyi tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs dang/ gnas sna tshogs rnams su byang chub sems dpa' ma/ gzhan yang rung ste/ 'dul ba sna tshogs rnams la chos bshad pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad par
4a5(mdo 'grel): snang ste/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ gdul ba'i 'gro ba de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur na/ 'di skad du de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yul 'di zhes bya ba
4a6(mdo 'grel): na/ bdag cag gi de na bzhugs so/ /bdag cag ni don bzhugs so zhes rtsod pa'am/ yid gnyis su 'gyur ba yang srid de/ de ltar 'gyur du dogs pa'i phyir/ thams cad du yang chos sdud pa mdzad pa
4b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis dus nges par mdzad do/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ rgyal po'i khab na lan mang du bzhugs bzhugs pa'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig gcig na zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi bcom pa dang
4b2(mdo 'grel): ldan pa la bya'o/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ rten bsten par bya ba dang ldan pa la yang/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste/ bsten par bya ba yang rnam pa drug ste/ dbang phyug dang/ ye shes dang/ grags pa dang/ dpal dang/ bsod nams dang/ brtson
4b3(mdo 'grel): 'grus dang/ bsten par bya ba 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' zhing ldan bas na/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas mchod rten du gyur pa bstan pas sems can
4b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur pa'i phyir gnas nges par bstan to/ /gnas de na bzhugs pa yang rnam pa bzhis bzhugs te/ spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa dang/ chos 'chad pas bzhugs pa dang/ snyoms par 'jug pas bzhugs
4b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ nang du yang dag 'jog gis bzhugs pa'o/ /de la sku'i phrin las su gtogs pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /gsung gi phyin las gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni chos 'chad pas bzhugS
4b6(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /thugs kyi phrin las gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni snyoms par 'jug pas bzhugs pa dang/ nang du yang dag 'jog gis bzhugs pa ste/ de la rtag tu mnyam par 'jog cing ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa ni snyoms par 'jug po'i
4b7(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa'o/ /thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten la dgongs pa dang/ lha la sogs pa 'ong pa'i go skabs dbye ba'i phyir gcig bu dben pa na bzhugs pa ni/ nang du yang dag 'jog gis bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa la 
5a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan te/ yul de na 'dre gdon gyis rtag tu gtses pa las/ grong khyer gyi ming rgyal po'i khab tu btags nas 'dre gdon gyis mi tshugs par gyur te/ de tshun chad yul dang grong khyer de rgyal
5a2(mdo 'grel): po'i khab tu grags so/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ grong khyer de gong khyer thams cad kyi gtso bo yin to/ rgyal po dang 'dra ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab ces bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di yang gsung rab thams cad kyi gtso bo yin par bstan pa'i phyir/ grong khyer gyi
5a3(mdo 'grel): mchog der bshad pa smos so/ /rgyal po'i khab ces bya ba'i yul dang grong khyer de yang rab tu rgya che bas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi sa phyogs gang kho na na bzhugs pa mi shes te/ de gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs po
5a4(mdo 'grel): la zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /ri de'i dbyibs bya rgod 'phungs po 'dra pa'i phyir bya rgod 'phungs pa zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po'i khab dang ri bya rgod 'phungs pa zhes bya ba'i gnas gnyis smos pa ni khyim pa'i phyogs dang/ rab tu byung pa'i phyogs gnyis
5a5(mdo 'grel): la phan 'dogs pa bstan pa ste/ rgyal po'i khab smos pas ni com ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms mdzad cing gshegs pa'i tshe/ khyim pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong na/
5a6(mdo 'grel): dad pa skyes te/ bsod snyoms la sogs pa 'bul zhing/ bsod nams byed pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs so/ /ri bya rgod 'phungs pa smos pas rab tu byung pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa rnams la/ chos kyi phan 'dogs pa bstan pa ste/ rab tu byung ba
5a7(mdo 'grel): rnams 'du 'dzi'i nang ni ma gnas par dgon pa'i sa phyogs ril gnas pa rnams la dam pa'i chos bshad pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs
5b1(mdo 'grel): pas/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste/ 'khor yang dge slong gi 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor rnam pa gnyis te/ de gnyis las dge slong gi 'khor sngon smos pa ni/ rab tu byung ba rnams sbyin gnas su gyur pa'i mchog yin
5b2(mdo 'grel): pas/ 'jig rten pas mchod cing bkur sti bya ba'i 'os yin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring na rtag tu gnas pa dang/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi spyod yul du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ dge slong gi 'khor sngar smos so/ /byang chub
5b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i 'khor ni khyim pa'i tshul du gnas pas sbyin gnas su ma grags pa dang/ sems can gyi don la gshegs pas zhabs 'bring na mi rtag pa dang/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir phyis smos so/ /dge slong lnga stong tsam
5b4(mdo 'grel): dang zhes bya ba'i grangs smos pas 'khor mang ba bstan pa'o/ /thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor rnams yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i sgo nas che ba nyid bstan pa ste/ thams cad kyang zhes bya baS ni 'khor
5b5(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa nyan thos de dag thams cad kyang/ dgra bcom pa sha stag ste/ 'khor de'i nang na rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogS pa slob pa'i gang zag gam/ so so'i skye bo gcig kyang med par bstan pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams
5b6(mdo 'grel): bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ a ri han zhes bya ba mi skye ba'i don la yang bsnyag ste/ 'khor bar slar mi skye ba'i chos nyid can sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ a ri ha na zhes bya ba 'os pa 'am/ nus
5b7(mdo 'grel): pa la yang bsnyeg ste/ bdag gi don thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas/ gzhan la rjes su stod par 'os shing nus pa 'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya bar 'os pa 'am/ khams gsum gyi mi dang lta'i gtso bo rnams kyis mchod pa rnam pa du mas
6a1(mdo 'grel): mchod par 'os pa sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na a ri ha naM zhes bya ba mchod pa la yang bsnyeg ste/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sgrub pa'i mchod pas rgyun mi 'chad par
6a2(mdo 'grel): mchod par byed pa'i phyir yang dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba ni zag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang srid pa'i zag pa dang/ ma rig pa'i zag pa dang lta ba'i zag pa rnams spangs te/ zag par gyur pa la yang zag pa zad
6a3(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ste/ de la 'dod pa'i zag pa ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtoD pa'i/ nyon mongS pa rnams so/ /srid pa'i zag pa ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/ /ma rig pa'i zag pa ni khams gsum char gyi ma
6a4(mdo 'grel): rig pa'o/ /lta ba'i zag pa ni lta ba lnga ste/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/ mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang/ log par lta ba dang/ lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o/ /chos 'di rnams
6a5(mdo 'grel): kyis sems can rnams 'khor bar 'khor zhing ngan song du ltung bar byed pa'i phyir zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par smin pa'i
6a6(mdo 'grel): phung po'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa noms? spangs shing med pa la bya ste/ de la las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ni/ 'du byed kyi dge ba dang/ mi dge pa dang lung dam bstan pa'i las rnams byed pas nyon mongs pa'o/ /
6a7(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/ /rnam par smin pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni sdug bsngal zhing nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i gzhi phung po lnga la bya'o/ /skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa/
6b1(mdo 'grel): ni ba'i mngal nas 'byung ba'i tshe sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong ba ste/ /de rnams med pa la nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni dbang bzhi dang ldan pa la bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang/ dbang po la dbang ba dang/ ting nge
6b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin la dbang ba dang/ shes rab la dbang ba'o/ /de la rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ni sems can gyi 'jig rten dang/ snod kyi 'jig rten dag gi dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga la dbang pas ni spyod lam nye bar zhi bas de dag la 'jig rten rnams dga' ba skye bar byed
6b3(mdo 'grel): do/ /ting nge 'dzin la dbang bas ni bdag gi sems dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shes rab la dbang bas ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad med par byed de bcings pa las grol ba bzhin du rang dbang thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems shin tu rnam par grol
6b4(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs par bstan pa ste/ de ltar sems rnam par grol ba thob pas ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar gyur pa bstan to/ /shes rab shin tu
6b5(mdo 'grel): rnam par grol ba zhes bya bas ni ma rig pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa bstan te/ de ltar shes rab kyi rnam par grol ba thob pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol pa bstan to///
6b6(mdo 'grel): cad shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa med pa la bya ste/ de bas na mdo sde dag las kyang/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir cad? shes pa lnga gsungs pa lta bu ste/ lce 'bab pa la sogs pa 'byung ba'i bag tsha ba dang/ 'jigs pa med khyu mchog cad shes pa/
6b7(mdo 'grel): 'thab mo'i 'jigs pa med pas lha? dang glang po che cang shes pa dang/ gzhan gyi gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa med pas seng ge cang shes pa dang/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med pas dgra bcom pa cang shes pa rnams so/ /'dir ni cang shes pa zhes bya bas bag cha
7a1(mdo 'grel): ba bzhi med pa bstan te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi bag tsha ba dang/ 'jigs pas bag tsha ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyis bag tsha ba dang/ mi shes pas bag tsha ba'o/ /de la mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa
7a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba rnams med pas sdug bsngal gyis bag tsha ba med do/ /bdag gis smad pa dang/ gzhan gyis smad pa dang/ ngan 'gror ltung ba dang/ 'tsho ba mi 'byor pa dang/ chad pas bcad du dogs pa dang/ mi snyan
7a3(mdo 'grel): par grags su dogs pa dang/ 'chi bas 'jigs pa rnams med pa'i phyir 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba med do/ /rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang/ grags pa dang ma grags pa dang/ bstod pa dang smad pa dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis gos pa med pa'i
7a4(mdo 'grel): phyir/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyis bag tshab med do/ /mi shes pa dang/ the tshom dang bcas par shes pa dang/ log par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ /mi shes pa'i bag tshab med de/ de bas na de lta bu'i bag tshab rnams med pa'i phyir chang shas pa
7a5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /glang po chen po zhes bya ba ni gtso bo chen po zhes bya ba'i don te/ khyed par rtogs pa'i chos thob pa'i phyir glang po chen po zhes bya'o/ /bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa zhes bya bas ni/ bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan bstan
7a6(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ las kyi gtso bor mi byar mi rung ba la ni bya ba zhes bya'o/ /zhar la bya ba ni byed pa zhes bya ste/ de la las kyi gtso bo mi byar mi rung ba yang tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par byas pas/ sdug bsngal thaMs cad
7a7(mdo 'grel): las rnam par thar par bya ste/ de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pa la bya ba byas pa zhes bya'o/ /zha dal bya ba ni 'dod pa chung bar bya ba dang/ chog shes par bya ba dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad ma ku?
7b1(mdo 'grel): bar bya ba la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa ni byed pa byas pa zhes bya ste/ de bas na bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa zhes bya ba 'dis bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam par thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan bstan to/ /khung bor ba zhes bya ba la khur ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ phung po'i
7b2(mdo 'grel): khur dang/ nyon mongs pa'i khur dang/ khas 'ches pa'i khur dang/ brtson 'grus kyi khur rnams te/ de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pas ni phung po'i khur bor ro/ /kun 'byung ba spangs pas ni nyon mongs pa'i khur por ro/ /lam bsgoms pas ni
7b3(mdo 'grel): khas 'ches pa'i khung por ro/ /'gog pa mngon sum du byas pas ni brtson 'grus kyi khur por bar shes par bya'o/ /bdag gi don rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba la/ bdag gi don tho pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ don ma yin pa spangs pa dang/ don du gnyer ba grub pa'o/
7b4(mdo 'grel): de la ma rig pa spangs pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs par gyur pa ni/ don ma yin pa spangs pa'o/ /rig par skyed pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ni don du gnyer ba grub pa'o/ /srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa zhes bya ba ni sprad par
7b5(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa dgu spangs pa la bya ste/ srid par sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa dgu gang zhe na/ lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang/ mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang/ the tshom gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang/ phrag dog gi kun tu sbyor ba dang/ ser sna'i kun
7b6(mdo 'grel): tu sbyor ba dang/ khod khro ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang/ nga rgyal gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang/ ma rig pa'i kun du sbyor ba dang/ srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun tu sbyor pa rnams te/ nyon mongs pa 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khro bar skye bar sbyor ba'i phyir
7b7(mdo 'grel): srid par kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la bya ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la goms par byas pas nyon mongs pa'i
8a1(mdo 'grel): sgrib pa thams cad yongs su spangs te/ sems yongs su dag par gyur pa la/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/ /sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa zhes bya ba ni bsam
8a2(mdo 'grel): gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la goms pa'i mthus sems la dbang thob pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/ sems la dbang thob pas/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la
8a3(mdo 'grel): lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa dang/ thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa la thags thogs med cing/ ji ltar 'dod par mnyam par 'jog nus pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la sems dbang du gyur pa yongs su rdzogs shing
8a4(mdo 'grel): mthar phyin pa sha? stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' po'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'ba' zhig de'i tshe rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dgra bcom par
8a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba la slob pa yin te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yon tan smos pa'i nang du ma gtogs te/ de 'ba' zhig rgyun tu zhugs pa yin gyis/ gzhan thams cad dgra bcom pa sha stag go zhes bya ba'i
8a6(mdo 'grel): don to/ /de ltar 'khor dge slong rnams bstan nas/ 'khor dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams bstan pa'i phyir/ dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lha brgya tsam dang/ dge bsnyen
8a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang zhes bya ba gsungs te/ kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag ces bya bas ni de dag thams cad kyang bden pa mthong ba sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
8b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste/ tshad dang grangs nges pa ma smos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnams pa sna tshogs du ma nas 'dus pa sha stag ste/ mang chos pa'i phyir
8b2(mdo 'grel): tshad dang grangs 'di snyed cig go zhes tshad dang grangs chang bar ma smos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang rnam pa lnga ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa dang rtsol pa dang bcas pa la mtshan ma med par gnas pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa la lhun gyis grub
8b3(mdo 'grel): par gnas pa dang/ sbyor ba nges pa la zhugs pa dang/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams so/ /de las dang po nas sa drug pa la gnas kyi bdud ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'o/ /sa bdun pa ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa la mtshan ma med par gnas pa'o/ /
8b4(mdo 'grel): sa brgyad pa ni mtshan ma med par la lhan gyis grub par gnas pa'o/ /sa dgu pa ni sbyor pa nges pa la zhugs pa'o/ /sa bcu pa ste/ mdor pa bsdus na dran pa dang shes rab la bya'o cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni
8b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste/ de la gzungs zhes bya ba yang/ chos rnams kyi don dang tshig rnams phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pas na gzungs zhes bya ba ste/ mdor ? bsdus na dran pa dang shes rab la bya'o
8b6(mdo 'grel): so sor dbye ba na rnam pa bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i gzungs dang/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs dang/ chos kyi gzungs dang/ don gyi gzungs so/ /de la bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i gzungs ni chos
8b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad gza' ma nas ma skyes shing rang bzhin gyis stong par bya pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i ? shes pa dang sran pas bsgoms pa'i don dang/ tshig ma brjod par rtogs pas thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rtogs shing/ stong pas mi skrag 
9a1(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa la bzod pa thob pa zhes bya ste/ bzod pa de lta bu thob pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i tshe/ shes rab dang dran pa la bzod pa thob ba'i rgyud gyur pa'i gzungs zhes bya'o/ /gsang sngags kyi gzungs ni byang
9a2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin grub cing sems la dbang du gyur pa'i mthu dang sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa'i shugs kyis sems can rnams kyi gnod pa sna tshogs bsal ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams byin gyis rlob ste/ de
9a3(mdo 'grel): ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi mchus? byin gyis brlab pa'i gsang sngags de dag gis kyang/ sems can rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad sel nus par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i gzungs sngags byin gyis rlob pa'i mthu dang ldan pa la gsang sngags kyi gzungs zhes
9a4(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /chos kyi gzungs nis thob par byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs la nyan ba'i tshe sngon mi ye shes? ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig rnam grangs mang po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin du shes rab kyi zin cing dran pas
9a5(mdo 'grel): yun ring por yang mi brjod par nus pa la chos kyi gzungs zhes bya'o/ /don gyi gzungs ni de ltar chos kyi tshig mang por bshad pa rnams phyin ci ma log par gzung ba'i don sa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang/ stobs dang/ mi 
9a6(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'bras bu thob par bya ba rnam pa mang po tshad med grangs med pa rnams thob par nus ba'i dran pa dang shes rab tu ldan pa la don gyi gzungs zhes bya ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa la gzungs thob pa zhes
9a7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag mang po rnams thob pa zhes bya ba'i don te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang 'og nas zhib tu 'chad do/ /spyod pa nyid kyis rnam par
9b1(mdo 'grel): spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa zhes bya bas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/ de ltar gong du bshad pa'i rim pas gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos
9b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad stong pa nyid du gtogs pas na/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar stong pa nyid la spyod cing bsgom ba'i rgyus/ gzugs la sogs pa phyi nang gi chos gang la yang dngos por mi lta zhing/ mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas na/ mtshan ma med
9b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya'o/ /de ltar chos thams cad la dngos por mi lta zhing mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/ chos gang la yang chags ba med pas khams gsum gyi bde ba'am 'byor pa gang la yang bde bar rnam par rtog pa med cing/ de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir stson?
9b4(mdo 'grel): pa med bas na rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la legs par gnas pa de spros pa thams cad nye bar zhe ba'i phyir chos thams
9b5(mdo 'grel): cad mnyam? pa nyid kyi bzod pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag dang gzhan du rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir sems can mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang/ /byams pa dang sdod pa med pa'i phyir 'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang/ chos thams cad de
9b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin nyid tsam gzung? ba'i phyir chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sems mnyam pa'i phyir mi gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa ste/ bzod pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa
9b7(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o/ /thogs pa med pa'i spobs? pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa de shes rab kyis chos thams cad stong par rtogs kyang/ snying rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi
10a1(mdo 'grel): gtong ba'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa sngon du yang mi byed la/ shes rab kyis chos thams cad stong par rtogs shing/ nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pas 'khor ba la yang chags shing thogs pa med la/ nyan
10a2(mdo 'grel): thos ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la yang chags shing thogs pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa la/ thogs pa med pa'i sogs? pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so sor yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar gong du
10a3(mdo 'grel): bshad pa'i rim pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan pa'i thabs rnam pa mang po zad mi shes pa rnams la rab tu mkhas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/ /mngon par shes pa chen pos
10a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos bstan pa'i tshul la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji ltar chos bstan pa'i tshul la mkhas pa'i rgyu bstan pa ste/ sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin la
10a5(mdo 'grel): mnyam par bzhag pa'i mthus mngon par shes pa drug thob par 'gyur te/ mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis sems can kyi don rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa la mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ste/ chen po smos pa ni
10a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes par bas mthu dang yon tan khyad par du 'phags par che ba'i phyir ro/ /mngon par shes pa drug ni lha'i mig dang/ lha'i rna ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa dang/
10a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang/ zag pa zad ba shes pa dang drug go /de la lha'i mig giS ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dge ba dang mi dge ba ci spyod pa rnams gzigs nas
10b1(mdo 'grel): de dang mthun pa'i don mdzad do/ /lha'i rna bas ni sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dags dang/ mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba'i sgra thos nas/ de dag gi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pas ni
10b2(mdo 'grel): lus dang ngag gi sprul pa sna tshogs dang/ yo? byad kyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs sprul pas sems can rnams kyi so so'i yid dang sbyar te phan 'dogs so/ /gzhan gyi sems shes pas ni sems can gzhan rnams kyi sems la/ ci sems pa shes paS
10b3(mdo 'grel): de dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ dbang po la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun par chos ston cing phan 'dogs so/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas ni sems can rnams tshe rabs snga ma la gnas gang dang gang skyes pa
10b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ ci dang ci spyod spyod pa mkhyen pas/ de dang mthun par chos bstan pa la sogs pas phan 'dogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rlabs bo che rmad du byung ba rnams bdag gis dran pas sems can rnams la bzlas
10b5(mdo 'grel): pas sems can rnams dad pa bskyed pa dang/ rtag par lta pa dang/ chang bar lta ba rnams la tshe rabs sng ma 'byung ba'i rgyud bstan pas rtag par lta ba dang/ chad par lta ba las zlog par mdzad do/ /zag ba zad pa shes pas ni byang chub sems
10b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa zad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa zad par gyur tam/ /ma gyur pa yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i thabs dang
10b7(mdo 'grel): thabs ma yin pa yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpas de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyon nas/ bdag nyid kyis zag pa zad pa mngon du mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zag pa zad pa'i shes pa de nyid kyis/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i
11a1(mdo 'grel): chos rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang chos de dag gis bdag nyid kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mngon bar shes pa drug po de dag gis sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs pa mdzad pa la mngon par shes pa
11a2(mdo 'grel): chen pos rnam par rtse ba zhes bya'o/ /mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshe 'phos na yang/ mngon par shes pa drug po de dag nyams par mi 'gyur te/ mngon par shes pa drug po de dag ni byang chub
11a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' la tshe rabs thams cad du med par mi 'gyur te?/ brgya la dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skyes na yang nyams shing med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
11a4(mdo 'grel): ni de ltar mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan 'dogs pa gcor byed pas/ phan gdags par bya ba'i sems can de dag kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' de la rang bzhin gyis dga' ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' i
11a5(mdo 'grel): ngag? nyan par 'gyur ta?/ byang chub sems dpas gdams shing rjes su bstan pa las/ srog gi phyir yang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na byang chub sems dpa' sngon? sbyin pa dang tshig
11a6(mdo 'grel): snyan pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i bsod nams kyi mthu dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang don dang ldan zhing/ rig pa dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ba' zhig smra ba'i phyir/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa
11a7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya ba la le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /lus dang srog la mi lta ba zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos btsal ba dang/
11b1(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog la mi 'phangs par dam pa'i chos btsal ba dang/ sems can gyi don byed pa la bya'o/ /tshul 'chos pa med pa/ zhes bya ba ni lus kyi las yongs su dag pas log par 'tsho ba'i skyon med pa bstan pa ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti
11b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i phyir gzhan dag la lus kyi spyod lam 'chos shing zhi ba dang tshul du shis par ston pa ni tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o/ /kha gsag med pa zhes bya ba ni ngag gi skyon med pa bstan pa ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i phyir gzhan dag la gtam bu'i tshig smra ba ni
11b3(mdo 'grel): kha gsag ces bya'o/ /grags pa dang kha dang bkur sti'i sems med pa zhes bya ba ni yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa'i skyon med pa bstan pa'o/ /zang zing med pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya bas ni sbyor ba yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/ sems can rnams la chos
11b4(mdo 'grel): ston na yang snying rje yongs su zin cing shes rab kyis shin tu sbyangs pas/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags ba'i sems med pa la zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa zhes bya'o/ /'di yan chad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' i sa bdun pa man chad rtsol ba dang bcas shing
11b5(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa'i yon tan rnams bstan pa'o/ /chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs pas khong du chud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni byang chub sems dpa' i sa brgyad pa yan chad rtsol ba med cing mtshan ma med par gnas pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan
11b6(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa yan chad ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas gyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba thams cad ched du bsams shing bcel? mi dgos par sngon gyi spyod pa'i shugs dang/ smon lam gyi mthus
11b7(mdo 'grel): lhun gyis grub pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes par rtogs pas chos zab mos mi 'jigs shing mi skrag pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya'o/ /mi
12a1(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa chen po thob pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor dang/ rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i 'khor dang/ bdud dang mu stegs can la sogs
12a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro yang mi shes pa'i 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang/ nyon mongs pa las gyur pa'i 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob ces bya'o/ /yid yongs su zhum pa med pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar mi 'jigs
12a3(mdo 'grel): pa chen po thob pas rgyal rigs dang bram ze la sogs pa'i 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro yang/ 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med de/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yid yongs su zhum pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag
12a4(mdo 'grel): par 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni cis kyang mi rdzi ba'i mthu dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/ bdud kyi las 'og nas 'byung ba rnams dang/ mdo gzhan las bshad pa'i bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi tshugs? pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcad pa zhes
12a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni de ltar gong du bshad pa'i rim pas mi shes pa dang/ /nyon mongs pa'i 'jig pa med cing/ bdud kyi las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir/ sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis bde 'gro dang/ ngan 'gror skye bar 'gyur ba med pa sha stag go zhes bya ba'i
12a6(mdo 'grel): don to/ /las dang nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ zhes bya ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can phas rgol
12a7(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya bas ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi shes pa dang bsam pa dang spyod yul rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes
12b1(mdo 'grel): par mi nus pa zhes bstan pa'o/ /chos rab tu rtogs bas rnam pa dang bye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs
12b2(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtogs pas/ chos de dag gi rang gi mtshan nyid dang spya'i? mtshan nyid rnam par dbye zhing/ gzhan la ston pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don te/ de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa'i
12b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan bstan to/ /bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ zhes bya bas ni sa dgu pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/ sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon bskal pa grangs med pas na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs
12b4(mdo 'grel): su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ sems can gyi don mthar phyin par bya bar smon lam btab cing/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa brtsams pa rnams mthar phyin cing yongs su rdzoD par gyur te sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu dang/ spyod pa'i shuD kyis de yan chad sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su
12b5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par bya ba'i spyod pa dang/ sems can gyi don yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i spyod pa rnams 'bad cing ? pa mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas su bsgrub pa dang/ sems can gyi don du spyad pa rnams kyang gdon
12b6(mdo 'grel): mi za bar 'grub pas spyad pa dem pa la zhugs pa zhes kyang bya ste/ de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa yang sngon yun ni dang po nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams
12b7(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o/ /bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ thog mar smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ zhes bya bas ni de ltar sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus spyod pa la nges par zhugs ba/ sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon sems can rnams la tshang
13a1(mdo 'grel): med pa bzhi spyod spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ste/ de la bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bas ni byams pa'i rgyu mthun pa bstan pa ste/ sngon sems can la byams pa spyod spyod pa'i rgyus dus thams cad du sems can
13a2(mdo 'grel): rnams la bzhin 'dzum pa 'ba' zhig ston cing sems can rnams dga' bar byed kyi/ nam yang dom 'dzum nag cing sems can rnams mi dga' bar mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /thog mar smra ba zhes bya bas ni snying rje'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ sngon sems
13a3(mdo 'grel): can rnams la snying? rje spyod spyod pa'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can glo bur du 'ongs ba ma 'dres pa rnams la yang snying rje'i shugs kyis sems can de dag dga' bar bya ba'i gtam gyis snga nas bsu zhing gsong por smra ba dag go zhes bstan
13a4(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /khro gnyer med pa/ zhes bya bas ni dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi rgyu mthun pa bstan pa ste/ sngon sems can rnams kyi 'byor ba la phrag dog dang/ sems 'khrug pa med cing dga' ba bskyed bskyed pa dang/ bdag la gnod pa byed pa dang/ nyes pa
13a5(mdo 'grel): byung ba rnams la yang bzod cing dang du blangs te/ btang snyoms su 'jog 'jog pa'i rgyus mi dga' ba dang/ khros shing 'khrugs pa'i mtshan ma bzhin khro gnyer can du nam yang mi 'gyur ba dag go zhes bya ba'i don to/ /snyan cing 'jam pa'i cho ga dang
13a6(mdo 'grel): ldan pas pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkham pa zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro 'gro ba dang/ mngon par shes pa la spyod spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon
13a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la tshigs su bcas pa'i dbyangs kyis yon tan rnams brjod cing bstod bstod pa dang/ mngon par shes pa'i mthus sems can rnams kyi spyod pa dang/ bsam
13b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rjes su mthun par yid du 'ong zhing 'thad pa'i tshig gis chos ston ston pa'i rgyus sa dgu pa thob pa'i tshe yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstod pa dang/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i tshe snyan cing 'jam pa'i tsig dang ldan
13b2(mdo 'grel): pas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /spobs pa mi chod pa/ zhes bya bas ni sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor gyi nang du chos smra ba chen po yin pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/
13b3(mdo 'grel): de dag so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pas 'khor mang po la chos ston pa'i tshe/ spobs pa chen pos bshad pa la thags thogs med cing sus kyang zil gyis mi non pa dang ldan pa ngag go zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'khor mdza' yas pa zil gyis
13b4(mdo 'grel): gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ zhes bya ba ni 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba la mkhas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bstan te/ de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan zhing spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor
13b5(mdo 'grel): gang gi nang du 'gro na yang mi shes pas 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med de/ bdag gi shes pas ni 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon la/ gzhan sus kyang bdag zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir 'khor mdza' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan
13b6(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o/ /bskal pa bye ba mdza' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/ sems can gyi don du chos ston pa dang/ dka' ba spyod
13b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i brtson 'grus lhun gyis grub pas ci bya'o cog la skyo zhing yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bskal pa du mar spyod kyang yun ring por thogs pa'i 'du shes med pas/ bskal pa bye ba mdza' yas pa yang yengs la zad cing 'das pa'am/ de las
14a1(mdo 'grel): byung bar byed pa la mkhas pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /de ltar sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la nges par zhugs pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan nas/ sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams
14a2(mdo 'grel): kyi yon tan bstan pa'i phyir/ thams cad sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang chu zla dang rmi lam dang/ sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang/ nam mkha' dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ sprul pa dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa zhes bya ba gsungs te/ sa bcu
14a3(mdo 'grel): pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis don dam par chos thams cad dngos po med par rtogs kyang/ kun rdzob tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang/
14a4(mdo 'grel): sems can yongs su smin pa dang/ rnam par grol bar bya ba'i spyod pa rnams sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu dang/ spyod pa'i shugs kyis btsal zhing 'bang? mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'byung ste/ spyod pa de dag la yang dngos po dang mtshan mar mi
14a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin cing ma chags par spyod pa ni/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgya? la sogs pa lta bur khong du chud pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ste/ sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe rnam pa bcu bstan pa yang/ gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ the tsom tha dad pa
14a6(mdo 'grel): rnams bsal ba'i phyir te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dngos po med na ci'i phyir kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs su snang bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/ sgyu ma'i dpe bstan te/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis rta dang
14a7(mdo 'grel): glang? po che la sogs pa'i dngos po sna tshogs byas pa rnams kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i khyad par sna tshogs su snang yang yang dag par yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i dngos por snang yang yang/
14b1(mdo 'grel): dag par yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o/ /sems can kha cig ni de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ci la yang dmigs te 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/ smig rgyu'i dpe bstan te/ smig rgyu la chu'i dngos
14b2(mdo 'grel): po med par yang de la dmigs nas chu'i 'du shes skye zhing/ sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ chos thams cad gyab? rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dngos po med de/ dmigs pa'i yul ma yin yang sems can rnams phyin ci
14b3(mdo 'grel): log tu rtog cing 'khrug pa las sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ /chos thams cad dngos po med na/ skye ba dang 'jig par yang ji ltar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la chu zla'i dpe bstan te/ dper na nam mkha' la zla ba
14b4(mdo 'grel): snang na ni tshu'i nang du yang zla ba 'byung zhing snang bar 'gyur la/ nam mkha' la zla ba mi snang na ni chu'i nang gi zla ba yang med cing mi snang bar 'gyur pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'jig par snang ba yang phyin ci log tu rtog pa'i bag chags yod na
14b5(mdo 'grel): ni snang la bag chags de dag byang ste med na skye ba dang 'jig par yang mi snang ngo zhes bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste dngos po med na/ bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs te 'jig rten gyi tha snyad rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam
14b6(mdo 'grel): du sems pa la/ rmi lam gyi dpe bstan te/ dper na rmi lam na bza' ba dang btung ba dang/ sbyin pa dang len pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs par snang yang dngos po'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams
14b7(mdo 'grel): cad don dam par dngos po med par yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba'i rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad dngos po med na/ ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la
15a1(mdo 'grel): sgra brnyan gyi dpe bstan te/ dper na brag dang cod rong smra ba med pa las sgra 'byung ba grag pa/ sgra gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'byung ba de bzhin du sgrar rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa 'khrul pa las ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs rnams 'byung
15a2(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur gyi/ dngos po ni gang yang med do zhes bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad dngos po med na/ ji ltar rgyu dang rkyen rnams las 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/ mig yor dang nam mkha' dang dri za'i grong khyer gyi dpe bstan te/ dper na mig rab rib
15a3(mdo 'grel): can du gyur pa'i rgyus skra shad 'dzings pa la sogs pa snang ba dang/ ri rab kyi ngos rin po che bai DUrya'i 'od kyis nam mkha' sngon por snang ba dang/ yul gyi khyad par dang sprin dang nye ba'i rgyus/ dri za'i grong khyer rnams snang ba grong khyer dngos su yod pa ma yin pa de
15a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang rgyu dang rkyen las byung yang don dam par yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad dngos po med na rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dra par ji ltar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la gzugs brnyan gyi dpe bstan te/ bzhin gyi rgyus
15a5(mdo 'grel): ma long gi nang du bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan bzhin dang 'dra bar snang yang/ bzhin yang dag par ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dra bar byung yang don dam par yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad dngos po med na/?
15a6(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams ji ltar yod par 'gyur snyam du sems pa la sprul pa'i dpe bstan te/ dper na sprul pa rnams 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i lus kyi las dang/ dag gi las rnams byed pa sna tshogs snang yang/
15a7(mdo 'grel): dngos por yod pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang kun rdzob tu bya ba sna tshogs byed par snang yang don dam par dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o/ /sems yongs su zhum pa med pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems shis?
15b1(mdo 'grel): tu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/ sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang/ rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang sa gong ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
15b2(mdo 'grel): gyis 'phags pa rnams kyi spyan sngar sems zhum par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing/ rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa dang/ dbang po rnams thob pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du sems
15b3(mdo 'grel): zhum pa med pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang/ shes pa phra ba dang/ skyed pa dang/ mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyus/ sems can thaMs cad
15b4(mdo 'grel): kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang/ mos pa khong du chud pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes phra ba dang
15b5(mdo 'grel): spyod pa la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/ de la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang/ mos pa rnam pa sna
15b6(mdo 'grel): cho gas khong du chud nas sems can de dag gdul ba'i thabs la mkhas par gyur to/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes zab cing phra ba dang/ spyod pa rgya chen po khong du chud par bya ba la
15b7(mdo 'grel): mkhas par gyur pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyab pa la brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i stobs dang/ sems can thams cad
16a1(mdo 'grel): kyi sdug bsngal sel ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa la bstan pa'o/ /bzod pa rlabs chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khyad
16a2(mdo 'grel): par can du dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas/ sa 'og ma dag la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de dag shin tu sbyangs shing rgya che bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul zab cing phra ba rtogs par dka' 
16a3(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyang rtogs par nus shing bzod pa'i phyir/ bzod pa rlabs po chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ste de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mkhyen pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa la dar las chod pa tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa
16a4(mdo 'grel): nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ zhes bya ba la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni chos nyid de bzhin nyid la bya ste/ de bzhin nyid de bdag gis so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs par byed pa la yang mkhas la/ gzhan
16a5(mdo 'grel): rtogs par byed du 'jug pa la yang mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya bas ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ches nyid zab mo rtogs pas de dag gi sems kyang zab cing stag dka' 
16a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir ro/ /rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems de dag gi sems yongs su dag pas nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/ zhes bya bas ni 'dus byas
16a7(mdo 'grel): dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos thams cad sems tsam du zad par shes pas phyi rol gyi dngos po mi btsan par/ bdag gi sems kyis ci 'dod par bsgyur nus pa'i mthu dang ldan pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta
16b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bden pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni rten cing 'brel ba yan lag bcu gnyis
16b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa la mkhas pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos zab mo la
16b3(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ste/ de la zhugs pa ni rtogs shing khong du chud pa la bya'o/ /lta ba dang bag la nyal ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba la/ lta ba ni 'jig tshogs su lta ba
16b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang/ log par lta ba dang/ lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o/ /bag la nyal ba ni bdun te/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags bag la nyal ba dang/ khong khro ba bag
16b5(mdo 'grel): la nyal ba dang/ srid pa'i 'dod chags bag la nyal ba dang/ nga rgyal bag la nyal ba dang ma rig pa bag la nyal ba dang/ lta ba bag la nyal ba dang/ the tshom bag la nyal ba'o/ /kun nas ldang ba brgya de/ rmugs pa kun nas ldang ba dang/
16b6(mdo 'grel): gnyid kun nas ldang ba dang/ rgod pa kun nas ldang ba dang/ the tshom kun nas ldang ba dang/ phrag dog kun nas ldang ba dang/ ser sna kun nas ldang ba dang/ khrel med pa kun nas ldang ba dang/ ngo tsha mi shes pa kun nas ldang ba ste/ nyon mongs pa de
16b7(mdo 'grel): dag dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ zhes bya ba la kun tu sbyor ba ni dgu ste/ chags pa kun tu sbyor pa dang/ khong khro ba kun tu sbyor ba dang/ nga rgyal kun tu sbyor ba dang/ ma rig pa kun tu sbyor ba dang/ lta ba
17a1(mdo 'grel): kun tu sbyor ba dang/ mchog tu 'dzin pa kun tu sbyor ba dang/ the tshom kun tu sbyong pa dang/ phrag dog kun tu sbyor pa dang/ ser sna kun tu sbyor ba ste/ nyon mongs pa 'di rnams sems rnams 'gro ba rgyud lngar skye bar byed cing kun tu sbyor ba'i
17a2(mdo 'grel): phyir/ kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya ste/ nyon mongs pa de rnams spangs pa la kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thabs la mkhas pas
17a3(mdo 'grel): bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /bden pa rab tu rtogs pa'i bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ kun rdzob
17a4(mdo 'grel): dang don dam pa'i bden pa rnams bdag dang gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mos pa zhes bya bas ni lung gi chos gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis
17a5(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa sgra dang tshig gi rang bzhin du grags pa rnams la/ /dngos por mi lta bar sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtogs pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya bas ni de ltar lung gi chos rnams la/ 
17a6(mdo 'grel): don dam par dngos por mi lta yang/ kun rdzob tu sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i chos kyi tshul bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pas/ /'khor gang dang gang du chos de dag rnam par phye zhing ston pa la/
17a7(mdo 'grel): 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyus/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul la
17b1(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul yang/ rnam pa gnyis te/ don dam pa'i bdag nyin ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pa dang/ kun rdzob kyi chos rnams kyi bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thugs
17b2(mdo 'grel): su chud pa'o/ /de la don dam pa'i bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud ba ni don dam par chos thams cad de bzhin nyid tsam du zad de/ mtshan ma dang rtog pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa'o/ /kun rdzob tu bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pa ni sems
17b3(mdo 'grel): can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa bla na med pa rnams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par
17b4(mdo 'grel): bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mdza' yas pa rnam par bkod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa zhes bya ba ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i rgyus sngon sman li ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du grub pa'i
17b5(mdo 'grel): yon tan bstan pa ste/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' i sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i che/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can dang/ pad mo can la sogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdza' yas pa rnams mthong zhing thos nas/ nam bdag mngon par
17b6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu 'am/ de bas kyang lhag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang/ smon lam dang mthun par brtson 'grus brtsams shing/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i 'thus
17b7(mdo 'grel): sa bcu la gnas pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi zhing mdza' yas pa rnams par bskang pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin ba zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i
18a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa zhes bya bas ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon?
18a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i dbang gis sa bcu la gnas pa'i tshe yang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad mngon du gyur cing/ sangs rgyas de dag gi
18a3(mdo 'grel): spyan snga na rtag tu gnas bdag go zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad du song nas/ mchod cing bkur?
18a4(mdo 'grel): sti bya ba la mkhas bdag go zhes bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol pa btab par mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyi drungs su so? pa?
18a5(mdo 'grel): nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams yun ring du bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sems can kyi sta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed
18a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar byas pa la mkhas ba zhes bya bas ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ mos? pa dang/ dbang po tha dad?  pa
18a7(mdo 'grel): rnams gzigs nas/ de dag la ci rigs par chos bstan cing nan tan byed du bcug pas de dag gi lta ba sna tshogs las gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams thabs mkhas pas zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa dag? go? zhes bya ba'i don to/ /ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon
18b1(mdo 'grel): bar bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni/ mngon par shes pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/ sngon ting nge 'dzin rnam pa mang po bsgoms pa'i mthus rdzu 'phrul rnam pa
18b2(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs kyis rol cing/ sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mdza' yas bar ma zad pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bas ni sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yon tan re
18b3(mdo 'grel): re nas brjod na bskal ba mdza' yas bar brjod kyang mi rdzogs pa'i yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par? bstag go zhes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan brjod pa mjug bsdus te bstan pa'o/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang
18b4(mdo 'grel): skyong dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bzhugs pa thams cad kyi mtshan brjod kyis kyang mi lang pas de dag gi nang nas gtso? bo? nyung? shes gcig gi mtshan brjod de bstan pa'o/ /
18b5(mdo 'grel): ? gsal nyan thos? gyi? dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan ni ma brjod la/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ni ci'i phyir brjod can/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthu che ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams? thams cad du grags pa dang byang chub sems
18b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' i theg pa la gtogs pa'i phyir ming khyad par du brjod do/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bston pas mdo sde thams cad dang mthun pa'i gleng gzhi bstan nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshed pa'i gleng gzhi khyad par
18b7(mdo 'grel): can bstan pa'i phyir/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'di ? kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sku drang por bsrangs te/ dgongs ba mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs de/ de? la? bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
19a1(mdo 'grel): gdan seng ge'i khri bshams pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa ni thun mong ma yin par bstan pa dang/ dkon zhing rin che bas mchod cing bkur sti bya bar 'os pa yin par bstan pa dang/ 'khor rnams gdul ba'i phyir te shes
19a2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa'i gdan yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bshams pa dang sbyar na/ 'di bshad pa yang gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin te/ thun mong ma yin par mngon no/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan bshams pa dang
19a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar na/ /chos bshad pa 'di dkon zhing rin che bas mchod cing bkur sti bya bar 'os ba yin par mngon no/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan bshams nas 'khor 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyang chos bshad pa 'di la de lta bu'i
19a4(mdo 'grel): bkur sti dang/ rim gro mdzad na bdag cag lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas chos bshad pa la rim gro cher byed du gzhug ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan bshams par rig par bya'o/ /sku dang por bsang ba dang/ skyil mo krung bcas par
19a5(mdo 'grel): bstan pas ni gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams bsgom pa dang mthun pa'i lus rab tu sbyangs shing las su rung bar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /dgongs pa mngon du gzhag pa bstan pa ni gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la sogs pa la sems rtse gcig tu
19a6(mdo 'grel): gnas shing las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir dran pa mngon du bzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /chos bshad ba'i gleng gzhi 'di yang cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis bstan to/ ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul dang/ byin gyis brlabs kyi cho 'phrul chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul
19a7(mdo 'grel): gyis bstan to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul na ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyis bstan te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po dang/ seng ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la der zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang/ khong du chud pa dang/ rjes su 'brang
19b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ 'du bar 'gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par bzhag na/ ting nge
19b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin thams cad kyi don 'grub cing/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mthu dang yon tan dang ldan pas rgyal po dang 'dra ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /de bas na ting nge 'dzin der ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang khong du chud pa dang rjes su 'brang ba dang 'du bar
19b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba zhes gsungs te/ de la 'du ba dang khong du chud pa zhes bya bas ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad rnam par mi rtog cing mi g.yol/ /sems rtse gcig tu gnas shing btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin du gcig ste tha mi dad pa bstan to/ /rjes su 'brang
19b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang 'dul bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bas ni 'od zer 'gyed pa dang/ sems can gyi don bya ba la sogs pa don du grub pa rnams gcig pa bstan to/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul de yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te/ yan lag dang nying lag las 'od zer 'gyed
19b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ spu'i dbung bu nas 'od zer 'gyed ba dang/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od zer 'gyed pa dang/ ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer 'gyed pa'o/ /de la de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi
19b6(mdo 'grel): spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/ /de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste zhes bya ba nas/ sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang/ 'od nges gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag
19b7(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni yan lag dang nyid la gnas 'od zer 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ /de la de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas zhes bya bas ni/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
20a1(mdo 'grel): par bzhag pa las/ sngon gyi smon lam dgongs shing sems can gyi don bya ba'i dus la bab pa mkhyen pa bstan to/ /'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas gyi zhing 'di na 'khod
20a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems can rnams skal pa dang ldan pa dang/ mi ldan pa brtag pa'i phyir gzigs pa bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das la ni de ltar dgongs shing gzigs pa'i rtog pa mi mnga' mod kyi/ gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyis de ltar mthong ba dang/ chos sdud pa'i byang
20a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod du rung bar bya ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi skye bo rnams chos 'chad pa la nan tan bskyed pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir te?/ de skad bshad do/ /'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug? byung ngo/
20a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la da bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer ni kha dog rnam pa drug yod de/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang le brgan? dang 'od gsal pa'o/ /'od zer kha dog drug po? de? dag phyogs bcur rnam par 'bros na drug cur 'gyur ro/ /bye? ba khrag
20a5(mdo 'grel): khrig brgya stong du gyur pa ni gdul bar bya ba'i sems can mang ba dang/ don du bsgrub pa mang pa'i phyir 'od zer kha dog sna gcig las kyang de snyed du 'gros bar rig par bya'o/ /drug cu drug cu zhes lan gnyis smos pa ni/ zhabs gnas ? rigs pa sku'i
20a6(mdo 'grel): yan lag dang nyid lag bal tshar gnyis gnyis yod pa brtsan par byas nas lan gnyis su bzlas te gsungs par rig par bya'o/ /'od zer de dag kyang don rnam pa gnyis sgrub? ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kun tu snang bar byed ba'i don sgrub? la dang/ seMs can
20a7(mdo 'grel): rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i don grub pa'o/ /de la 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang bar byas? te zhes bya ba la sogs par? ni 'jig rten gyi khams
20b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kun tu snang? bar bya ba'i don bsgrub pa bstan to/ /sems can gang gi 'ong de mthong ba dang/ 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to zhes bya bas ni sems can rnams
20b2(mdo 'grel): la phan 'dogs pa'i don bsgrub pa bstan to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu bgye ba mdzad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni/ spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ /'od zer de dag kyang don
20b3(mdo 'grel): dam pa gnyis sgrub pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer 'gyed par cho 'phrul bstan pa ste/ 'od zer de
20b4(mdo 'grel): dag kyang don dam pa gnyis bsgrub pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od ces bya ba ni sku mdog bzang zhing 'od gsal ba 'phros pa la bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas lags kyi dbang po 'brang? ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni
20b5(mdo 'grel): ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer? 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ste/ zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ldags? kyi dbang por? khyad? par mdzad nas zhal ma dzum? pa mdzad
20b6(mdo 'grel): pas ni/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'chad ba'i snga ltas bstan to/ /ljags kyi 'od zer de dag thams cad las pad ma rnams byung ba bstan pas ni/ chos 'di dad? pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams pad ? gos? pa ltar/ byang chub sems
20b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' i skyon med pa la des par 'jug par gyur pa'i mtshan ma bstan to/ /pad ma de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos 'di nyid ston pa bstan pas ni byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di ?
21a1(mdo 'grel): nyan pa de dag pad ma kha bye zhing rgyas pa bzhin du blo rgyas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas nas/ phyogs phyogs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas bstan to/ /
21a2(mdo 'grel): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni seng ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul bstan te/ cho
21a3(mdo 'grel): 'phrul 'di yang snod kyi 'jig rten bzang zhing bde bar byi dor bya ba dang/ sems can gyi 'jig rten la phan gdags pa dang/ rnam pa gnyis su bstan te/ de la snod kyi 'jig rten bzang zhing bde bar byi dor bya ba'i cho 'phrul ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
21a4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te zhes bya ba nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan te/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa ni g.yos pa dang/ 'gul ba dang/ ldeg pa dang/ tsham? tsham?
21a5(mdo 'grel): zer ba dang/ 'ur 'ur zhes zer ba dang/ shig shig ces zer ba rnams te/ re re la yang dwag? dal 'bring rnam pa gsum gsum ste/ dang po dal bus g.yos pa la g.yos pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'bring du g.yos pa la rab tu g.yos pa
21a6(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu de bas kyang drag tu g.yos pa la kun tu g.yos pa zhes bya ste/ lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyor ro/ /mdza' mtho na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mdza' dma'/ zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa
21a7(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi tshe/ mdza' dang dbus mthon dman du gyur pa la bya bas rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i nang du gtogs te logs shig tu mi bgrang ngo/ /dal bus g.yos kyis nyams su bde ba dang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed par gyur to zhes
21b1(mdo 'grel): bya bas ni de ltar rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i tshe yang/ sems can rnams dngang zhing skrag pa la sogs par mi 'gyur bar ri dang sa gzhi dang rtsi shing la sogs pa yang la 'jam zhing snum pa dang nyams dga' bar gyur te zhes bstan to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig
21b2(mdo 'grel): yud tsam thad cig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ mi khom ba dang/ ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang/ log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de
21b3(mdo 'grel): dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te/ zhes bya ba la sogs bas ni sems can gyi 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i cho 'phrul de yang stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
21b4(mdo 'grel): 'di'i sems can ngan song rgyud gsum la sogs pa na gnas pa dang/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams ngan song rgyud gsum la sogs pa na gnas par ngan song gi sdug bsngal nas thang cing mtho ris kyi
21b5(mdo 'grel): bde ba myong bar gyur pa dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sems can dmus long dang 'on pa la sogs pa'i mi bde ba dang bcas pa rnams kyang mi bde ba de dag las thad pa dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las dang
21b6(mdo 'grel): 'tsho ba mi dge ba rnams kyang dge ba gyur pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig pha ma dang/ phu nu la sogs pa dang 'dra bar sems mnyam par gyur ba dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang/ gtsang spra che?  ba dang
21b7(mdo 'grel): nyes pa'i skyon med pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur ba ste/ de la mi khom pa zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos mngon bar rtogs shing 'phags pa'i sa thob par bya ba'i skabs
22a1(mdo 'grel): dang skal pa med pa la bya'o/ /mi khom pa de yang rnam pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal bar skyes pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang/ yi dags su skyes pa dang/ mdza' 'khob kyi kla? klor skyes pa dang/
22a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa dang/ 'du shes med pa'i srid par skyes pa dang/ dmus long dang/ 'on pa dang/ lkugs pa la sogs par gyur pa dang/ log par lta bar gyur pa dang/ sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa la skyes pa rnams so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gden
22a3(mdo 'grel): seng ge'i khri nyid la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha' i dbyings yongs su dag la 'dug pa 'am zla ba nya pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshang?
22a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis non par bzhugs shing/ 'od dang sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzod shing lham me lhan ne lhang de'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi byin chen po'i yon tan
22a5(mdo 'grel): bstan pa ste/ nyi ma dang zla bas skar ma la sogs pa'i 'od can thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ri gzhan rnams zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa rnams zil gyis
22a6(mdo 'grel): mnan te bzhugs so zhes bstan pa ste/ 'od kyis ni tshangs pa'i 'od snyems pa rnams zil gyis mnan no/ /sku mdog gis ni brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha mdog bzang po snyems pa rnams zil gyis mnan to/ /gzi brjid kyis ni bdud dang mu stegs can
22a7(mdo 'grel): rnams zil gyis mnan to/ /dpal gyis ni mi rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs so/ /'od dang ldan pas ni mdzes so/ /sku mdog dang ldan pas ni lha ma me'o/ /gzi brjid dang ldan pas ni lhan ne'o/ /dpal dang ldan pas ni lhad deng bzhugs so zhes bya
22b1(mdo 'grel): bar sbyar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang/
22b2(mdo 'grel): lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos bstan to snyam so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni byin gyi rlabs kyis cho
22b3(mdo 'grel): 'phrul bstan te/ byin gyi rlabs kyi cho 'phrul zhes bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas dad pa skyes te/ mchod pa sna tshogs byed pa dang/
22b4(mdo 'grel): mchod pa byas pa'i ma tog la sogs pa de dag kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur pa dang/ khang
22b5(mdo 'grel): pa brtsegs pa de las kyang me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyed bar gyur pa dang me tog dang dar? gyi lda ldi de dag dang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang phyogs bcu'?
22b6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed shin tu mdzes par khyab cing gsal bar gyur pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku gcig pu bstan kyang gling bzhi'i mi rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams
22b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams dang/ stong gcig dang/ stong gnyis dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang/ lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas thams cad
23a1(mdo 'grel): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam du sems par byin gyis brlabs pa la /byin gyi rlabs kyi cho 'phrul zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya
23a2(mdo 'grel): ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku de mdog bzang zhing gzi byin che la 'od gsal ba/ mthong na skyo? mi shes shing/ phyi phyir je bzang je bzang snang ba la bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs bzhin
23a3(mdo 'grel): du 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul dang/ 'khor sdud pa'i cho 'phrul lo?/ /de la
23a4(mdo 'grel): yang 'ong des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rab tu snang bar gyur to zhes bya ba nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis ?
23a5(mdo 'grel): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dang ? ma
23a6(mdo 'grel): cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od rab tu bkye ba mdzad pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang phyogs
23a7(mdo 'grel): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyur te/ snang ba des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
23b1(mdo 'grel): gyi khams gang gI klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bas dga' ba dang/ dad pa skyes te mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal du 'ong 'dod
23b2(mdo 'grel): par gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gI klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor sdud pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ gong du smos
23b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rim pas sa g.yos pa dang 'od snang ba chen po 'byung ba dang/ 'od des mi ming da? kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa'i sku bstan chog mi shes pa de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i byang
23b4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'dus shing gshegs par bya ba'i phyir 'di rab tu bkye bar mdzad pa nyid la 'khor sdud pa'i
23b5(mdo 'grel): cho 'phrul zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'od zer gyis bskul te/ mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs pa yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad
23b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang smon lam gcig tu btab cing byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa mthun par spyod spyod pa'i rgyus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gdul zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyan mdzad par gyur pa'i phyir byang chub sems
23b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar gshegs par gyur to/ /shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gI klung gi bye ba snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na zhes bya ba la ni 'jig rten gyi khams mdza' yas pa'i phyir pha
24a1(mdo 'grel): rol gyi mdza' lta med mod kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang tshun chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dir gshegs pa rnams kyi tha ma la kun gyi pha rol zhes bya'o/ /kun gyi pha rol zhes smos pas de tshun chad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
24a2(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs par blta'o/ /bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong/ zhes bya ba la yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das shing srog gi dbang po'i rgyun la bzhugs pa'i phyir bzhugs zhes bya'o/ /sku la snyun? mi mnga' ba'i phyir
24a3(mdo 'grel): 'tsho zhes bya'o/ /glo bur gyi bsnyun mi mnga' bas sku'i tshe'i mnga' thang bzhin du tshe'i bar chad mi 'byung ba'i phyir skyong zhes bya'o/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na chos kyi sku ni gnas pa'i bzhin bas chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du zhugs pa la bzhugs zhes bya'o/ /
24a4(mdo 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa rnams la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod kyis 'tsho ba'i phyir longs spyod kyis 'tsho ba'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i chul du bzhugs pa la 'tsho zhes bya'o/ /sprul pa'i sku ni sems can yongs su ma dag pa
24a5(mdo 'grel): rnams skyong ba'i phyir sbrul ba'i sku'i tshul du bzhugs pa la skyong zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs 'bring na bzhugs pa'i byang chub
24a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' de dag las/ /ba? cig ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chub bas sems dang po bskyed pa nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas shing sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang/ kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa yan chad la
24a7(mdo 'grel): gnas pa thob bas rtsol pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i phyir rgyal po'i sras gzhon nu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'os pa dang 'dra bar
24b1(mdo 'grel): chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab kyi sa la gnas pa'i phyir gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi kha dog can rnams bskur ba dang/ bsnyun gsol spring ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams nga rgyal dang phrag dog
24b2(mdo 'grel): med bar bya ba'i phyir te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang gcig la gcig 'di ltar sri zhu dang gus pa mdzad na/ bdag cag gis de ltar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems shing dang pa skyes ba'i phyir ro/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na bcom ldan
24b3(mdo 'grel): 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig ces bya ba ni mi mdzad kyi 'jig
